description_carte: A constellation forgotten, Ophiuchus strikes from nowhere. Venomous fangs hide in a whirlwind of death.
description_visuelle: A serpentine figure shrouded in a cyclone of dark, swirling wind. Only its glowing red eyes and venomous fangs are visible within the storm.

skills.name: Venomous Strike
skills.description: A quick attack that poisons the target.

skills.name: Cyclone Shield
skills.description: Creates a swirling shield of wind, increasing VIT and evasion.

skills.name: Forgotten Fury
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of attacks, dealing moderate damage to a single target.

skills.name: Serpent's Gaze
skills.description: Paralyzes the target with a hypnotic stare.

skills.name: Wind of Oblivion
skills.description: Summons a devastating windstorm that deals massive damage to all enemies and reduces their ATK.
